contentrichtext.text: [[File:Nojiri in Miyazaki Prefecture.png|thumb|right|Location of Nojiri in Miyazaki]] {{nihongo|'''Nojiri'''|野尻町|Nojiri-chō}} was a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Nishimorokata District, Miyazaki|Nishimorokata District]], [[Miyazaki Prefecture|Miyazaki]], [[Japan]]. On March 23, 2010 Nojiri was merged into the expanded city of [[Kobayashi, Miyazaki|Kobayashi]] and no longer exists as an independent municipality.<ref name="Plannedmerge">http://www.kokudo.or.jp/new/cities/sub/kyusyu/45.htm</ref> As of 2003, the town had an estimated [[population]] of 8,705 and the [[population density|density]] of 97.96 persons per km². The total area was 88.86 km². ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.city.kobayashi.lg.jp/ Kobayashi official website] {{ja icon}} {{coord|31|57|57|N|131|6|9|E|region:JP_type:city|display=title}} [[Category:Dissolved municipalities of Miyazaki Prefecture]] {{Miyazaki-geo-stub}}
